text: And the Child kept growing and being strengthened in spirit,Less than half a percent of the Greek manuscripts, of objectively inferior quality, omit ‘in spirit’ (to be followed by NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). being filledBoth ‘strengthened’ and ‘filled’ are in the passive voice; like John, only more so, Jesus had outside help. with wisdom; yes, the grace of God was upon Him.
